p: Ten-day-old embryonated chicken eggs were purchased from Shimizu Laboratory Supplies, Japan. All animal experiments were conducted in compliance with Japanese legislation (Act on Welfare and Management of Animals, 1973, revised in 2012) and guidelines under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology in Japan. Animal care, housing, feeding, sampling, observation, and environmental enrichment were approved by the Animal Experiment Committee of the Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine (Approval number M29-554 and M30-60).
